description:
A modern file manager for Windows 10 and Windows 11.

OneCommander is a modern file manager for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Features include tabs, dual-pane browsers, columns navigation, built-in preview, a theming system, color tags, and much more. It is free for home use and has no ads.
ğŸ› ï¸ Added -b1 and -b2 (or -browser1 and -browser2) as switches to open path in first or second browser. Switch -newtab can be combined with it
ğŸ› ï¸ Drop into other file types (if added in Executables list in Advanced settings) works even if ScriptsExecutores are not setup
ğŸ Fixed working dir (Start in path) for created shortcut files
ğŸ Fixes and improvements with thumbnail extraction
